ingredients.item: 2 x 350g packs essential Waitrose British Chicken Mini Breast Fillets, roughly chopped
1 pack Waitrose 2 Sweet Peppers, seeded and diced
2 x 400g cans essential Waitrose Kidney Beans, drained and rinsed
Coriander leaves and rice, to serve

instructions.step: Spray a large pan with oil and cook the onion, ginger and chicken for 5 minutes until golden.

Stir in the tomatoes, lentils, peppers, beans, stock and chipotle paste. Bring to the boil, cover and simmer for 20 minutes until the lentils and peppers are tender and the chicken is cooked through with no pink meat.
Divide between bowls, scatter with coriander and serve with rice.
